Description:
Job DescriptionResponsibilitiesPosition Summary 
 
The SAP ABAP Developer analyzes user requirements, procedures, and problems to automate processes or to improve existing systems. Provides technical knowledge, system design techniques, methodologies, tools, and standards applied in the IT and business environment. As a key member of the SAP Core team, provide support to the business community for SAP in the ABAP Technical Development area.  This includes all new projects as well as production support across all functions within SAP. 
Key Duties and Responsibilities Applies company policies and procedures to resolve a variety of issues
Exercise judgment and independence in identifying next steps
Engage with other project personnel to ensure business application systems are developed in a way that aligns with architectural standards and established methodologies and practices
Provide programming knowledge, usually as a member of a project team, in the analysis, design, and development of SAP reports, interfaces, conversions, business forms, and user exits
Provide estimates for the programming and unit testing activities of a project when needed
Write new and modify existing data sources, infosets and queries
Develop and support interfaces to numerous legacy and third-party systems using a variety of techniques such as LSMW, BAPI, IDOC, RFC calls, BDC, and call transaction update methods
SAP ECC 4.7, 6.0 SAP ABAP on HANA Developer with practical experience using ABAP Development Tools (ADT) in HANA Studio/Eclipse.
Perform program performance optimization and tuning where vital
Research and apply OSS notes
Follow the IT SDLC process
Utilization of debugging techniques
Write detailed user documentation of program functions
Cross team communication and teamwork
Supervise and report to management on the status of project efforts, anticipating/identifying issues that inhibit the attainment of project goals and implementing corrective actions
Participate in off-hours meetingsRequirements (Must Have)Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, equivalent work experience acceptable
Good interpersonal and excellent documentation skills are a must
Demonstrable ability to be flexible and work hard, both independently and in a team environment, in a high stress environment with changing priorities
Pro-active, helpful, ‘can-do’ demeanor
Ability to explain and champion technical concepts to a broad audience
Knowledge of creating and maintaining detailed project plans using Microsoft products
Excellent customer service skills required
Strong analytical skills required, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret customer business needs and translate them into application and operational requirements
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and the ability to communicate effectively professionally with a diverse group, executives, managers, and domain experts
Self-managing and self-motivating; able to meet customer deadlines and expectationsSoftware requirements 3 to 6 years SAP ABAP development experience 
Demonstrated proficiency in the use of ABAP  
Proven ability using BADI’s, BAPI’s, LSMW, ALE, RFC calls, IDOC, BDC, business objects, classes and methods, Adobe Forms, Smartforms, SAPScripts, Data Dictionary, ALV
Experience with implicit and explicit improvements, screen exits, and menu exits
ABAP debugging skills
Experience in several of the following modules: SD/SM, FI/CO, MM/PP, QMRequirements (Desired)Relevant technical certificates a plus
Completed at least 1 full cycle implementation
Knowledge of SAP HANA Technical Concept and Architecture,
Strong implementation knowledge on Native SQL, ADBC, External View, ABAP Core data Services, AMDP Procedures, Text Search, ALV on HANA.
Practical experience in creating custom and enhance standard CDS view and AMDP class based on business requirement.
Practical experience of implementing various available annotation in CDS.
Strong Practical Knowledge of Code Performance Rules and Guidelines for SAP HANA
Strong implementation knowledge of OData using CDS and AMDP
Workflow experience, including support and debugging
Knowledge of NetWeaver 7.0 experience is helpful
Knowledge of BI is helpful
Experience with other programming languages, such as Java, XML, is helpful Job Details
